description: 26-day intensive program based on the peer-to-peer learning methodology, where I worked on problem-solving and programming in C. During this period, I developed skills in Unix environments, Shell scripting, and low-level programming logic, strengthening my adaptability and self-learning abilities.

Intensive training focused on Full Stack development, where I gained experience with modern technologies for web and mobile development. I learned about scalable architectures, SQL and NoSQL databases, agile methodologies like Scrum, testing with Jest, and DevOps tools like Docker. Through hands-on projects, I reinforced my ability to build complete applications from frontend to backend.

role: Higher Degree in Web Application Development (DAW)
description: Web application development training program where I acquired knowledge in design, programming, and application maintenance. During this period, I worked with technologies such as Java, JavaScript, PHP, and databases, learning to build dynamic and responsive websites. I also strengthened my teamwork and problem-solving skills in collaborative development environments.

role: Intermediate Degree in Microcomputer Systems and Networks (SMR)
description: Technical training in IT and networking, where I discovered my passion for programming. I learned about operating systems, network configuration, and the fundamentals of web development with HTML, CSS, and PHP. This stage allowed me to build a solid foundation in technology and reinforce my interest in software development.
